page.title: 02RATES, NE Sutton coldfield
page.content: All residents were affected when the West Midlands Metropolitan Coucil increased rates by 43% this year. Many home owners are already struggling to meet high monthly mortgage repayments determined by the high price of property in the area and can ill afford this substantial increase in the rates. Businesses too have felt the strain of this increase as it does nothing to encourage their expansion or thoughts of enlarging their work forces. The rate increase is the subject of great local concern in 1985.
